title: Anson Seabra Trying my best
content:
Trying my best 中文歌詞ヾ(･ω･*)ﾉ
太喜歡這首歌了所以翻翻看
I know you think I got it all figured out cuz
我知道你以為我已經搞懂了一切 但
I walk around like my head's in the clouds but
我四處漫遊著 像是在做著白日夢 但
I'm just boy with his heart pourin' out
Of his head


I wish that you could see the pain that I've seen and
我希望你能看到我所經歷的痛苦
All of the time I spent being not me and
那些不在做自己的日子
I hope you know it's not always happy
In my head
我希望你能看到我不是一直都快樂著

Cuz I don't know
因為我不知道
The perfect road to go down
正確的方向
But I know
但我知道

I'm trying my best
我在努力著
I'm trying my best to be okay
努力的讓自己沒事
I'm trying my best but every day
It's so hard
即便我已經努力了但還是好難

And I'm holding my breath
我屏著氣
I'm holding my breath 'til I can say
憋著氣等待我能說出
All of the words I wanna say
From my heart
從我心中說出我想說的話

If you really wanted I could let you inside
如果你真的想要我可以讓你進入我的內心
It's been so long and I've got nothing left to hide
那裡已經空了很久
Would you believe if I told you that I've
Got flaws
如果我告訴你我並沒有那麼完美你會相信嗎

Now it's time to let the curtains unfold and
現在已經是謝幕的時間
Tell the stories that I didn't want told
說那個我不願意傾訴的故事
Let it out so I unburden my soul
Won't stop
讓故事流瀉而出使我的靈魂不停止的卸下負擔

Cuz I don't know
因為我不知道
The perfect road to go down
正確的路要怎麼走
But I know
但我知道

I'm trying my best
我在努力著
I'm trying my best to be okay
我在努力的裝作沒事
I'm trying my best but every day
It's so hard
即便我努力了但還是好難

And I'm holding my breath
我屏著氣
I'm holding my breath 'til I can say
直到我可以說出前憋著氣
All of the words I wanna say
From my heart
那些我內心中所有想說的事

很悲傷的歌(っ˘̩╭╮˘̩)っ
很久沒翻譯ㄌ見諒(っ˘̩╭╮˘̩)っ
